attributes.review:
i downloaded this app to keep tabs on good ol donald here, but as soon as i opened the app i was sucked into a world where i have to defeat the seven levels of trump. 
1. racism 
2. misogyny 
3. pedophilia 
4. homophobia 
5. xenophobia 
6. karens 
7. the man himself. 
i barely made it out with my life 
be cautious!!!!
